name: Usinna's Adventure
description:
In an idyllic village far on a northern island the musk ox that are important for the village's livelyhood have been stolen. The village shaman Orpa claims the deed was done by an evil spirit and only a courageous heart can hope to damage it. Therefore the task was placed upon Orpa's daughter Usinna. She is glad to accept her new responsibilities but she has a nagging feeling that something is amiss...

Made during Luotsaamo 2.0 video game development course this current version of Usinna's Adventure is a demo that presents one half of it; the finale will be available on a later update.
